CustomField.formula:
CASE(MainLOAStatus__c, "Awaiting Policy Numbers","Please add your policy number to your profile"&".",
"Awaiting Provider Policy Numbers","Please add a provider & policy number to your profile.",
"Send to Provider","We are chasing for information"&".",
"Sent to provider","We requested information on " + TEXT(DAY(Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c))+"/"+TEXT(MONTH(Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c))+"/"+TEXT(YEAR(Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c)) &".",
"LOA Rejected Internal","We requested information on "+TEXT(Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c)&"."&" " +(LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__r.Name)& " has told us that we should receive this by"&" " +TEXT(LOA_Expected_Response_Date__c)&"."&" We last chased on " +TEXT(Date_Last_Chased__c)&".", ("") )
CustomField.label: First Five Stages Email Description
